name: Minor Injury
description: -1d to STR/RFX/INT governed Dice Pools. The injury will naturally heal over the next few days, or faster if treated actively.

name: Medium Injury
description: -2d to STR/RFX/INT governed Dice Pools. The injury must be treated relatively soon otherwise further penalties may apply such as infection.

name: Serious Injury
description: -3d to STR/RFX/INT governed Dice Pools.  The injury will lead to death in time if untreated.

name: Fatal Injury
description: -4d to STR/RFX/INT governed Dice Pools. The injury will lead to death very soon if untreated. The character inflicted with this injury is Physically Incapacitated (see the Narrative Effect).

name: Death Blow Injury
description: -5d to STR/RFX/INT governed Dice Pools. The injury causes death.
